name: 3D RC Car Nitro Street Racing: eXtreme Buggy City Race Simulator FREE
name_original: 3D RC Car Nitro Street Racing: eXtreme Buggy City Race Simulator FREE
description:
Charge up your batteries and get ready to tear it up in this R/C Car simulator. Drive as fast as you can in the city streets. Watch out for cars though, don’t get flattened. Do you have what it takes to handle an extreme RC car?

Features
-Awesome 3D Graphics
-3 car configurations to choose from
-Realistic Physics
-Dynamic Traffic
